body.raw:
<Section className="section--auto-margin">
<ContentWithBackground src="/images/blog/blog.jpg" className="vh-50 w-100">
    <SectionFooter className="text--light text--emphasized">
      Blog
    </SectionFooter>
  </ContentWithBackground>
  <Content className="w-100 pb-3">
    <NewsIndex />

  </Content>
</Section>
